Professor's Note: If you think this looks a little like valuing a bond using spot rates,
as we did for arbitrage-free valuation, you are correct. The discount factors are
equivalent to spot rate discount factors.
If we have a semiannual coupon bond, the calculation methods are the same, but
we would use the semiannual discount rate rather than the annualized rate and
the number of periods would be the number of semiannual periods.
